comments: This is a template production configuration file for the VAMS v2.1 to v2.2 migration script.
Replace the placeholder values with your actual production values before running the migration.
It is recommended to first run with dry_run set to true to verify the changes that would be made.
Then set dry_run to false when you're ready to run the actual migration.
Make sure to back up your data before running the migration in production.
base_assets_prefix should end with a slash (/) for proper path construction.
asset_bucket_name is the name of the S3 bucket used for asset storage.
comment_storage_table_name is optional and used for migrating comments to reference current asset versions.
asset_links_table_name is the name of the old asset links table to migrate from.
asset_links_table_v2_name is the name of the new asset links v2 table to migrate to.
